      • readRandomIndexPack

        public static final RandomIndexPack readRandomIndexPack(InputStream stream,
                                                        long size)
                                                 throws IOException

        Read a random index pack (RIP) from the given input stream, using the given size to efficiently skip to the end of the file to find the RIP. As the RIP is always located at the end of the file, the input stream is always closed following this operation.

        Parameters:
        stream - Stream of MXF data to read and retrieve the RIP from.
        size - Total size of the input stream measured in bytes, which must be known in advance of a call to this method.
        Returns:
        Random index pack contained in the given input stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - Problem occurred when reading the file or no RIP is contained within the file.
